snippet: After 15 years of inhabiting the pages of Lee Child’s crime thrillers, that series’s hero finally comes to life in the form of Tom Cruise in “Jack Reacher.”
abstract: Tom Cruise plays title character in movie Jack Reacher, adaptation of Lee Child's novel One Shot, directed by Christopher McQuarrie; Childs's books have been under option to various studios for 15 years, but film realization was delayed, in part, by lack of suitable actor for main role.
lead_paragraph: After 15 years of inhabiting the pages of Lee Child’s crime thrillers, that series’s hero finally comes to life in the form of Tom Cruise in “Jack Reacher.”

headline.seo: Tom Cruise as Lee Child’s Fictional Hero in ‘Jack Reacher’
headline.main: A Big Name Steps Into Big Shoes
headline.print_headline: A Big Name Steps Into Big Shoes
